ctu_text: **Procedure for Selection of Awardee Students:** Each State/UT will conduct its own test at the stage of class 8th for the selection of students. The State Level Examination may consist of the following two tests: 1) Mental Ability Test (MAT), 90 minutes duration: 90 multiple-choice questions testing verbal and non-verbal meta-cognitive abilities like reasoning and critical thinking. The questions in the test may be on analogy. classification.
